title: Please ID this ornament or flourish
content:
I think it's a font ornament/flourish but I'm not 100% sure. It could also be an ornament from a vector image collection. I know I've seen it many times before – just can't recall the name.

I need it urgently so any information on the foundry or image source would be much appreciated.

Many thanks,

scarlett
